dct_title_s: Pascaerte van Nieu Nederland : streckende vande Zuÿdt Revier tot de Noordt Revier en't Lange Eÿland
dct_description_sm: Depths shown by soundings. North oriented towards right. Cartographer and imprint from Burden. From: Het brandende veen ... / belchzeben door Arent Roggeveen. Amsterdam : P. Goos, in compagnie met der autheur, [1675] "This sea chart of effectively New Jersey is derived directly from the very rare Pieter Goos chart of the same region first published in 1666."--Burden, P.D. The mapping of North America II, p. 66.
dct_publisher_sm: [Amsterdam : Pieter Goos, in compagnie met der autheur, 1675]
